mapper.select: SELECT zp.id,zp.name,zp.brand,zp.recommend,zp.icon,zp.module module,zm.name moduleName FROM zh_module zm left join zh_product zp on zm.id = zp.module where zm.deleted =0 and zp.deleted =0 order by zm.id , zp.id

SELECT zp.id,zp.name,zp.brand,zp.recommend,zp.icon,zp.module moduleId,zm.name moduleName,zp.formula, zp.creator,zp.created,zp.modifier,zp.modified FROM zh_module zm left join zh_product zp on zm.id = zp.module where zm.deleted =0 and zp.deleted =0 order by zm.id , zp.id
